title: Achilles' Heel
description: A scalable full-stack MERN MVC app transporting users to a realm of bright, educational games in Ancient Greece to mitigate stress (MERN MVC, Leaflet, Mapbox, Dicebear, Google Auth APIs, Material UI, Inkscape)

title: Skip to the Loo
description: A User-driven full-stack application that identifies nearby public restrooms in times of need, pertinent during the era of COVID-19. (MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, Sequelize ORM, Google Places API)!

title: Purple Pages
description: Group API Project:  A vital web application for finding which streaming service offers the TV show, sports program or film that you want to watch right NOW!

title: Scheduler
description: This schedule-planner displays a daily 8am-6pm calendar and allows the user to plan appointments for each hour of the day. You can generate a new quote of the day as a daily heading for fun or inspiration.

title: Resume Tile
description: This is an update of my First Webpage, Resume, Bio, and Current Contact Info.

title: Burger
description: A MVC structured app where you can create and devour burgers and interact with a gourmet menu (MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, ORM )!

title: JavaScript Quiz
description: This a timed, multiple-choice JavaScript quiz that utilizes event clicks, elements that disappear and reappear, hover, and overlay.

title: Team Generator
description: A Node CLI app that generates a webpage of ID cards displaying your Software Team. Cards have user input and define a clear summary of info fro each member.

title: Kill the Virus!
description: Inspired by COVID-19 back in March 20, This is my first ever videogame made in Scratch!
